page.title: 06STREET GAMES IN WORSBROUGH
page.content: {BRITISH BULLDOG}can be played with as many people as you want. Then you decide who is on. The rest of the people run to the end of the street. When the person who is on shouts 'British Bulldog 1,2,3,' the rest of the people run to the other end of the street without being caught by the person who is on. If you are caught, you have to be on with the other person. If one person stops at the end of the street they are allowed 10 seconds to get past the person who is on and if they don't move they are automatically out. The first person who was out has to be on in the next game.
